product_name: HALF MAGICFlik Eraser Makeup Correcting Pen
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingThe holy grail makeup correcting pen with a unique paddle shaped tip. Perfect your wings, lip liner, and graphic eye looks with Half Magic's FLIK ERASER.
details: DetailsBenefitsUlta-precise paddle shaped tip for clean, crisp linesGentle yet potent micellar water removes even waterproof imperfectionsWon't smear makeup underneathSafe for sensitive skin + eyesFeaturesCap and body are made of 10% ocean recycled plasticsItem 2627956How To UseSwipe FLIK ERASER along the edges of any area you want to clean up for a shaper look - like eyeliner, eye paint, eyeshadow, or lip liner. Use the thin edge of the paddle tip for ultra crisp lines and the flat edge of the tip to clean up larger areas or graphic looks.Clean tip after each use by tapping on a tissue or makeup wipe, to prevent color migration back onto skin.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Dipropylene Glycol, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycerin, C12-14 Alketh-12, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Citrate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swipe FLIK ERASER along the edges of any area you want to clean up for a shaper look - like eyeliner, eye paint, eyeshadow, or lip liner. Use the thin edge of the paddle tip for ultra crisp lines and the flat edge of the tip to clean up larger areas or graphic looks.Clean tip after each use by tapping on a tissue or makeup wipe, to prevent color migration back onto skin.

reviews.headline: A great correction pen!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Love the Magic! This is a lifesaver when trying to clean up your eyeliner. I love how it is scent free! Only issue I ran into is that the pen can get dirty quickly, but if wiped off after every use this will keep it clean. I do wish the product was a bit more affordable. I recommend combing this with the Half Magic Eyeliner.

reviews.headline: Very good
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The photo on the right is after using the makeup correction pen. The stuff really works and you'd be able to do some awesome wings and designs with this combo

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Erases mistakes easily. All you have to do is wipe the tip off if it becomes over saturated.  I definitely take it with me everywhere. It doesn't leave a sticky residue and therr is no scent. 10/10

reviews.headline: Tiny pen, major save âœ¨
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Where has this been all my life?! This little makeup eraser pen is pure magicâ€”one swipe and my eyeliner and mascara smudges disappear like they never happened. It's like an undo button ðŸ˜†. Compact, genius, and totally lifesaving for winged liner battles and mascara mishaps!

reviews.headline: Great makeup eraser
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The Flik eraser makeup erasing pen is so easy to use, and it removes any smeared makeup from lips and my face. I like that it doesn't smear any of my makeup while it removes the smeared makeup, eye liner, and mascara.  It doesn't leave an oily residue behind either.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This pen is a lifesaver! It makes fixing eyeliner mistakes so easy without ruining the rest of my makeup. The tip is super precise and doesn't smear everything around. Such a lifesaver for quick touch up. I love it, always keep it in my bag! Great for beginners and totally worth it.

reviews.headline: Love Applicator
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review! I'm personally new to using eyeliner corrector, but I would like to say that this was a good first experience! The packaging and pen size is great to hold in your hands and has a beautiful box that it comes in. The pen itself has a very thin but hard piece that makes sure that whatever you're correcting comes out great and soaks up the extra makeup very easily. It even worked in my waterproof eyeliner and make it very simple to fix small mistakes!

reviews.headline: Made a mistake? Erase it
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Packing is cute and it does work as you can see in the video. It dries up fast and it doesn't have a scent at all which is perfect. It's affordable and easy to use.

reviews.headline: Erasing made easy
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love winged liner as part of my everyday look but my nemesis is making a mistake and using either a q-tip or tissue to wipe off the excess. This eventually leads to a smudged messy look and having to start all over. I didn't even know correcting pens existed for eyeliner so this was a delightful surprise. Just one swift pass of this pen and the smudge is gone and your eyeliner look is crisp and perfect. The one small thing I didn't like was that it leaves a bit of a sticky residue, but it's not a dealbreaker for me.

reviews.headline: It's eh
reviews.comments: I feel like this is such a cool innovative product especially for wing liner lovers who are prone to make many wing mistakes. The tip shape is very cool. The packaging is simple it isn't too expensive and it removes ink very nicely because of the shape. But I don't like that pen gets "dirty" quick so when you go to erase eyeliner again it kinda smudges the product as you're taking it off. Also no scent that I can smell.

reviews.headline: Will def buy!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a new go to for me. It works so well! And it doesn't irritate my skin, I'm super sensitive!!! It doesn't smell like anything and the packing is so cute! But also minimalistic which I really like!

reviews.headline: Easy to use
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Love the simplicity and the packaging. The thin tip makes it so easy to erase. And it removes it so nicely. There is no scent which I like. There are only 8 ingredients.

reviews.headline: Works so well!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I just received the Half Magic Eyeliner and eraser as a PR gift , and I have to say, I'm genuinely impressed! The removal process was seamless and with no difficulties. I highly recommend for anyone looking for a reliable, high-quality eyeliner remover!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: These products are super effective! The entire line deserves an A+. The packaging is adorable, there are no unpleasant scents, and everything matched perfectly with my needs. I'll definitely be purchasing more from this brandâ€”it's highly recommended. The value for the price is absolutely worth it! [I received this product in exchange for my honest review]

reviews.headline: Works amazing
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review I loved it. It works great. I honestly have needed something like this for years and haven't found one till now. It's perfect for those annoying marks from mascara and more

reviews.headline: Must Have!!
reviews.comments: Such a lifesaver for fixing eyeliner and mascara smudges! The tip is precise and makes cleaning up wings super easy without ruining the rest of my makeup. Only thing is the tip gets dirty after a few uses so a quick wipe usually works, but it's still a must-have in my bag.

reviews.headline: A new makeup bag staple!
reviews.comments: I wasn't sure what to expect with a makeup remover pen, but let me tell you - I was NOT disappointed!! This is the best staple to have in your makeup bag! It's a game changer! No more need for quips or anything else! I love how easy it erasers, it doesn't leave anything behind! The style of the pens is well thought out and it has such a great grip!

reviews.headline: Great eraser
reviews.comments:
(I received this product in exchange for my honest review)

This eyeliner eraser is such a win especially for beginners! It is a total game changerâ€”fixing mistakes takes seconds and feels like magic. We no longer regret mistakes we learn from them. Its not scented and oder free. It does a great job at making the mistake disappear.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is amazing!!! it works so well especially for the price!! there's no scent and is so easy to use!! it's thin and sleek so super easy! the tip is also unique and helpful! i love it!!!!!!!

reviews.headline: Erases eyeliner mistakes
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This helped erase the bottom eyeliner easily. It has no scent at all and value for your money I would say worth it. It feel like the ingredient is oily at first but dried up pretty quick. Doesn't effect the fix it on the eyeliner when you mess up. Over all I think it helps.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have been using Half Magic's Flik Eraser Makeup Correcting Pen for a while now, and I am extremely impressed. I struggle with winged liner and have unsteady hands, so I usually go through 5-10 Q-tips when doing my makeup. Half Magic kindly gave me this product in exchange for my honest review and my opinion stands firm, this correcting pen is nothing short of magic.

It contains micellar water, which makes it super gentle yet effective against my waterproof liners and mascaras. The unique paddle-shaped tip is perfect for achieving sharp winged liner. And to clean the tip, simply tap it on a makeup wipe or tissue. It's also great for removing any mascara that smudges onto my lids and correcting lip liner mistakes.

This product, along with Half Magic's Flik Eyeliner, is the perfect duo, the photos do not lie!! If you're a perfectionist or new to makeup, you need to try this product. It's foolproof, and the days of licking qtips are officially over!
faceoff_positive.headline: Easy, Magic Correcting Pen

faceoff_negative.comments: Everyone, including professionals, sometimes needs to correct makeup application, and I am no different. I always mess up my winged eyeliner; it doesn't appear as sharp as I'd like. This Half Magic flick makeup correcting pen, which I received free in exchange for my review, seemed like the solution. With its paddle-tip applicator, it is truly a mess-free way to erase makeup imperfections. However, I observed that the applicator tip soaks up the makeup I am trying to erase and becomes dirty, making me skeptical about its hygiene and long-term effectiveness. No matter how thoroughly I dab the makeup wipes over its tip to clean it, bits of makeup still remain on the applicator. Though this pen assists in achieving a polished look, I don't see it as a regular makeup product I would reach for.
faceoff_negative.headline: Skeptical about using it
